Translations.Text: Nuzen ik id kan, i ubecceo d uneddeo
Ini: "ur awen ssutre$, $ef waya, kra n teqdiat. Ssutre$ kan, i win ib$an, ad ia$ abrid $eo Mass is
Ppkel $ef Umuddir ur Nepmeppat. Sbuccaa iT s ccekoan. Iqadd i tussna ibekkaven n imdanen iS
I Ixelqen tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, di sdis wussan. Sinna, Aenin Iaannec af usgeld. Steqsi w iT issnen
Ma pwanecden: "knut i Uenin"! A d rren: "d acu T Uenin? Day a neknu i w ara $ d tamoev"? D a$unfu i sen irna
Ad Ioqu Win Irran itran deg igenni. Irna degs, lefnao, akked waggur bu tziri
D Neppa i Irran iv akked wass mestebaan, i win ib$an ad ismekti, ne$ ib$an ad isnemmer
Ixdimen n Uenin, i ileeeun di tmurt di lehna, ma numren ten at war tussna, qqaoen: "tifrat
I ippaawazen i Mass nnsen, knan ne$ bedden
I iqqaoen: "a Mass nne$! Veooef segne$ aaaqeb n Loahennama. Ih, aaaqeb is ipwaeeppem
Neppat, s tidep, d tadirant, i tnezdu$t akked i$imi
Wid, ma seoofen, ur veggiaen, ur pcueeun: igi iwulmen atan garasen
